title: Stream: Tallows – Memory Marrow
content: Nine months since they burst onto these very pages, Oklahoma quartet Tallows have released their fantastic debut LP. Memory Marrow is an unrelenting listen, tearing through a score of musical influences, from the likes of Vampire Weekend to fellow Okie’s Kings of Leon, with a touch of Death Cab for Cutie added for good measure, it’s no frills attached, brilliant songwriting. Having had it on repeat over the past month or so, I can wholeheartedly say that it’s one of my favourite records of 2013 thus far. Check out Memory Marrow in full below, including my personal favourite, Mothball, and download it from their Bandcamp.
